welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maidenhead, a charming town known for its beautiful riverside setting and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Maidenhead has to offer and have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 45 minutes per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters specifically to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: London Luton Airport Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering premium services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
